column2: "Any time I think I'm lookin' at an enemy I know, they throw out some attack I've never seen before..."
"If they look the same, shouldn't they fight the same? They're just going out of their way to mess me up now!"
"But you're built different, killer! You can handle anything! You gotta show me how to deal with them!"
"You don't gotta take notes or anything! I'll be watchin' on the monitor so I don't miss a thing!"
